attributes.action: Health & Fitness Professionals sign up to Checkatrainer to regulate the industry
attributes.additional_details:
Checkatrade have launched Checkatrainer as there is nothing in the Health & Fitness industry that controls:

Qualification, insurance, interviewed, DBS, 

There are 88,000 self-employed Health & Fitness professionals "How do we know they have the right qualification and experience"
attributes.background: Checkatrainer goes through a in depth 9 point check to make sure all Health & Fitness professionals are qualified to be in controls not people's lives.

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be asking health and fitness professionals to take this action. 

We could accept a petition about regulation in the health and fitness industry. We couldn't accept a petition specifically about Checkatrainer, because we can't accept petitions that contain advertising. We could, however, accept a petition calling for Parliament to change the law to require health and fitness professionals to be checked and registered with a professional body or other scheme.
